name: Salmon Dilly Spread
description: Spread on bagels, wraps, and crackers – perfect for breakfast, lunch, and pre-dinner appetizers.

ingredients.name: smoked salmon, or 1 small tin of salmon

preparation: Mix all ingredients by hand or in food processor until smooth.
tips: Serving Suggestions:  Pinwheels: spread on tortillas and sprinkle with finely diced bell peppers. Roll up and slice into rounds.  Sandwiches: spread on rye bread and top with sliced peppers and lettuce.  Open-faced sandwiches: spread on pumpernickel bread, top with cucumber slices, and sprinkle with Epicure’s Lemon Dilly Dip Mix.  Appies: spread on cucumber rounds for a light and delicious appetizer.
